items.sentence: If you can help Tom, why can\'t you help Mary, too?
Tom didn\'t tell Mary about his financial problems.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone what he was planning to do.
Tom didn\'t understand what Mary was talking about.
Tom didn\'t wake me up at 6:30 like I asked him to.
I thought Tom was going to be in Boston last month.
What\'s that strange smell coming from the kitchen?
What\'s the best way to keep yourself from yawning?
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary couldn\'t speak French.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone that he\'d won the lottery.
